price: Shĩ ne Allah, Mai halitta, Mai ginãwa, Mai sũrantãwa. Yanã da sũnãye mãsu kyau, abin da ke a cikin sammai da ƙasa sunã tsarkake Shi, kuma Shĩ ne Mabuwãyi, Mai hikima.
arabic: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخَٰلِقُ ٱلۡبَارِئُ ٱلۡمُصَوِّرُۖ لَهُ ٱلۡأَسۡمَآءُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۚ يُسَبِّحُ لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: huwa al-lahu al-khāliqu al-bāri-u al-muṣawiru lahu al-asmāu al-ḥus'nā yusabbiḥu lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
